bio.name: Munira Akter
bio.title: Full Stack Developer
bio.intro: ðŸ‘‹ Hello, World! I'm Munira, a passionate and results-driven Full Stack developer in the world of web development. Throughout my journey in web development, I've gained 1.5 years of valuable experience crafting dynamic and user-centric web applications.
bio.desc: I specialize in building seamless digital experiences using technologies like React and Next.js on the frontend, complemented by Node.js and Express.js on the backend. From e-commerce platforms to content management systems (CMS), I've showcased my adaptability to diverse project domains. My skills extend to proficiently managing databases, both relational, such as MySQL, and NoSQL, like MongoDB, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval. I'm well-versed in crafting visually appealing user interfaces and have a knack for responsive design. My approach also includes comprehensive testing using Jest and Supertest to guarantee the reliability and functionality of web applications. Leveraging Git and GitHub for version control, I maintain clean, well-documented code repositories and thrive on collaborative development. My dedication to continuous learning keeps me at the forefront of web development trends, making me an asset to any team or project.
bio.cta: I'm excited to continue my journey in web development, taking on new challenges, and contributing to innovative projects. If you're looking for a dedicated and enthusiastic Full Stack Developer, feel free to reach out. Let's build something amazing together!
bio.whatCanI: My experience and passion for web development allow me to offer comprehensive solutions that encompass both design and development, making me a valuable asset for your projects.

projects.title: Ecommerce Site
projects.desc: Developed a feature-rich React book e-commerce platform integrated with Stripe payment gateway. Leveraged technologies such as React, Redux, Material-UI (MUI), Strapi CMS, and Next.js to build a scalable and secure online store. Implemented seamless payment processing through Stripe, ensuring a smooth and secure checkout experience for customers.

projects.title: Clean Youtube
projects.desc: Developed a YouTube API-based application tailored for students, prioritizing focused learning through a multiple selected playlist. By leveraging the YouTube API, the application removes ads and distractions, providing an uninterrupted and immersive learning experience. The app allows students to concentrate solely on the selected playlist, enhancing their productivity and knowledge retention.

projects.title: Product Landing Page
projects.desc: Designed a visually captivating landing page using React, Tailwind CSS, and React animations. Leveraged the flexibility of React to create interactive and dynamic components, while incorporating Tailwind CSS for efficient and responsive styling. Integrated React animation libraries to add engaging and smooth transitions, resulting in a visually stunning and user-friendly landing page design.

projects.title: Car Rantal SPA
projects.desc: This Car Rental Website is a dynamic and user-friendly platform designed to streamline the process of renting vehicles. This project showcases my web development skills and commitment to creating seamless online experiences for users.

expreience.title: Web App Developer
expreience.desc: As a web app developer at Spring Soft IT, I was responsible for designing, developing, and deploying a comprehensive web application for the company's Human Resource Management (HRM) department. The goal of the project was to streamline HR processes, enhance employee engagement, and improve overall operational efficiency.

expreience.title: Co-Instructor - JavaScript
expreience.desc: Served as a JavaScript Co-Instructor from 2021 to 2022, facilitating engaging and interactive learning experiences for students. Assisted in delivering comprehensive lessons, conducting code reviews, and supporting students in their journey to master JavaScript fundamentals.

expreience.title: Web & Software Developer
expreience.desc: As a freelance web and software developer on Upwork, I have successfully delivered high-quality projects, leveraging my expertise in front-end and back-end development. With a strong attention to detail and a commitment to meeting client requirements, I consistently exceed expectations and ensure client satisfaction.

expreience.title: Web & Software Developer
expreience.desc: As a freelance web and software developer on PPH, I have successfully delivered high-quality projects, leveraging my expertise in front-end and back-end development. With a strong attention to detail and a commitment to meeting client requirements, I consistently exceed expectations and ensure client satisfaction.

recommandations.name: Asraful Haque
recommandations.title: Chief Executive Officer at @ neooo inc
recommandations.text: I wholeheartedly recommend Munira Akter as a Laravel & MERN Stack developer. During our time working together at neooo inc, She consistently demonstrated exceptional technical skills and adaptability. Munira Akter is a valuable team member who communicates effectively and willingly mentors others. Her dedication to meeting project goals and staying up-to-date with industry trends makes her an asset to any organization. Don't hesitate to consider Munira Akter for your MERN Stack development needs; she is a talented and reliable professional.

recommandations.name: Abedin Raju
recommandations.title: Developer
recommandations.text: I am writing this letter to highly recommend Munira Akter for her exceptional skills and expertise as a front-end developer. I have had the pleasure of working closely with Munira on several projects, and her dedication, technical proficiency, and passion for her work have always stood out. Munira's ability to translate design concepts into seamless, interactive user interfaces is truly remarkable.

recommandations.name: Michael Gillis
recommandations.title: President, Western Australia Philippines Business Council
recommandations.text: Munira Akter redesigned an early website for our organisation. Her work was very good and her ability to complete the task in a very short timeframe was exceptional.
